msItem.title: Takhkirah-i Hamishah Bahar.
msItem.note: F1a: Signature of A.G. Ellis, dated 21.4.98. Inside front cover, pasted slip with handwritten description, price of 15/- and number E(llis?) 446. An anthology of Persian poems, some Indian, mostly quite late, including one of Fath 'Ali Shah Qajar (f24b). Begins with one of Mushtaq; ends with one of Mir Hutak Afghan. Written at the request of Hajji Muhammad Shirazi.

listBibl.bibl: Not the Hamishah Bahar of Kishanchand Ikhlas.

bindingDesc.p: Board binding, covers with marbled paper.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
